name: helprealm
description: dnyHelpRealm is a self hosted support ticket and helpdesk system. It lets users submit issues, track statuses and communicate with staff through an intuitive web interface suited for small teams and community projects.
features: Ticket Management: Create, assign, and track support tickets through their entire lifecycle.
Status Tracking: Monitor ticket progress with customizable status workflows.
Team Communication: Internal notes and comments for staff collaboration on tickets.
User Portal: Self-service portal where users can submit and track their own tickets.
Priority Levels: Categorize tickets by urgency to ensure critical issues get attention.
Email Integration: Receive notifications and updates via email for ticket activity.
Knowledge Base: Build a FAQ or documentation section to reduce support requests.
Small Team Friendly: Lightweight system designed for community projects and small teams.
